title: LiloBee
author: LiloBee
content: Tofycoin is a cryptocurrency that operates in the NFT area and can be used as a payment system in mobile, web and pc games. By using the technological infrastructure for both its own games and partner companies, Tofycoin is building a gaming ecosystem. Worion is the first FPS game in play to earn area. Meanwhile, Tofycoin can be used as an exchange currency for all transactions i.e game rewards, high ranking rewards, tournaments as well as all in-app purchases. Furthermore, it is an alternate payment method for GooglePlay and Apple store with its much lower cost and faster transactions.Bounty Campaign starts from  10th November and will run 6 weekWeek 1: 10/11/2022 - 16/11/2022Week 2: 17/11/2022 - 23/11/2022Week 3: 24/11/2022 - 30/11/2022Week 4: 01/12/2022 - 07/12/2022Week 5: 08/12/2022 - 14/12/2022Week 6: 15/12/2022 - 21/12/2022Total Pool: 5,000$ worth of $TOFY tokenDistribution: 1 Month After TGE Pool InformationTwitter campaign - 35%Telegram campaign - 30%Article campaign - 25%YouTube campaign - 10%This Campaign will be managed by LBeeservice . To ask all the questions please join the Bounty group LBeeserviceGeneral Rules 1. Must join Tofycoin Telegram Chat2. For any kind of bounty issue only ask in Bounty Group LBeeservice3. Must subscribe YouTube4. Every week you need to make a new post in the thread for weekly report submit, don’t edit and quote the previous post.5.  If you edit any previous post for report submitting your rewards will be Zero.6.  Don't complete any task just in one day. Do it by the whole week.7.  Using Multi-accounts, Spamming and Cheating are not allowed and will result in Disqualification from the Campaign.8.  Cheating Twitter Follower and Facebook Friends, using someone else to do the work and spamming or any kind of unethical behavior when participating to one of the campaigns are not allowed and will get you disqualified from all bounties.9. Submit the proof of authentication in the thread whatever campaign you are participating. It is a mandatory option.10. When bounty ends, you will have 7 days for any questions/complaints11. Making your own post must be unique and creative, useless and copy-paste posts are not allowed getting stakes12. Don’t discuss Bounty Related issue in Official Telegram Group  #PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username: Forum Profile Link: Telegram Username: Participated Campaigns: BSC Wallet Address: TWITTER CAMPAIGNRULES1. Follow Tofycoin Twitter Account 2. Your Twitter account must have at least 500 real followers.3. Your Twitter audit score must be equal to at least 90% and only real followers from the last audit will count.4. Your weekly posts must be at least 30 characters long, and unique. If you are found out literally copy-pasting other users posts, you will not be awarded any stakes, be unique.5. Participant profile must be public.6. All tasks should be done Daily, using 1-4 days to complete tasks will result to no stake for the week. 7. Use this Hashtags on your Tweet and Retweet : #Tofycoin #Gamefi #IDO #Play2Earn #NFT #P2E $TOFY and Website link.REWARDS5 Valid Tweets, Retweets and likes per week = 5 Stakes/week8 Valid Tweets, Retweets and likes per week = 8 Stakes/week10 Valid Tweets, Retweets and likes per week = 10 Stakes/week       TELEGRAM CAMPAIGNRULES1. You Must join Tofycoin TELEGRAM And TELEGRAM BOUNTY2. Add  “Tofycoin” to your Telegram username and Add Avatar3. Stay in the Telegram group until the Bounty is over.4. Anyone Posting Bounty Related issue in The Tofycoin Official Group will be Disqualified From All campaign5. Promote Tofycoin in other Telegram groups, but they need to be made in a constructive way, not in a way that might be considered spamming. Deleted messages won’t be counted.REWARDS1. Join Telegram Group = 1 Stake2. Add  “Tofycoin” to your Telegram username = 1 stake3. Using Tofycoin Avatar in Telegram  = 1 Stakes4. Posting messages about Tofycoin in your Telegram group or Others (minimum 1,000 members)( Use Project Telegram handle and website link) : 1 stakes per approved post5. Actively Discuss on main Telegram about their Recent tropic( don’t use hashtag on post): 1 stakes per approved post6. Make 2 Post on main group and Maximum 5 post on others group Per Week.       ARTICLE CAMPAIGNRULES1. Articles should be original and unique with a minimum of 500 words.2. Don't copy website about us section, details and whitepaper and other official staffs. Create your own words.3. Article founds plagiarized will get 0 stakes.4. Only 1 article per person. You can use your own blog website or medium, Steemit.5. Article topic must be about the Project.6. Article must contain 2 images related the project, link to the Website, telegram group.7. You must put your proof of authentication on the bottom of the article.REWARDSHigh Quality: 80 stakesMedium Quality: 40 stakesLow Quality: 20 stakes       YOUTUBE CAMPAIGNRULES1. Video must be original and made only by you.2. Your video must be 3 min long and must be uploaded to Youtube.3. Your video must have 300 views minimum. Or it will be disqualified.4. Only one video per person is allowed.5. Video description must have the website link, telegram group link.6. You must put your proof of authentication on the bottom of the video description.REWARDSHigh Quality: 80 stakesMedium Quality: 40 stakesLow Quality: 20 stakes       Note: I am not a part of the team, I was hired as a bounty manager to manage their bounty. Please join on your own risk, and if you want to invest please do your own research. I did my research too but I can be wrong.
